text: Pamene Ife tidawauza angelo kuti, “Mugwadireni Adamu.” Motero onse anamugwadira Iye kupatula Satana amene adali mmodzi wa ziwanda ndipo adanyoza lamulo la Ambuye wake. Kodi mudzasankha iyeyo pamodzi ndi ana ake kukhala okutetezani ndi kukuthandizani m’malo mwa Ine, pamene iwo ndi adani? Kodi ndi choipa chotani chimene anthu ochita zoipa asankha
